function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Overwhelm of information leading to entropy of the system","Impact":"Reduction in signal-to-noise ratio, potential misinformation, and decreased knowledge","Mitigation":"Implement filters for reliable information, and encourage individual responsibility for disseminating data","Technologies":"Information filtering algorithms, data verification tools","People":"Scientific community, social media users","Owner":"Scientific community, social media platforms"},{"Description":"Increase in credibility of personal opinions over scientific data","Impact":"Danger of misinformation and spread of personal beliefs as facts","Mitigation":"Promote critical thinking and fact-checking, encourage responsible sharing of scientific data","Technologies":"Fact-checking tools, critical thinking education","People":"Social media users, scientific community","Owner":"Education institutions, social media platforms"}]}
